NotFound.title: Page Not Found

Hero.description: Developer with over 10 years of experience building scalable web applications and robust architectures.
Hero.downloadFormat: Available in PDF and TXT format
Hero.brand_phrase: Though my name is <bold>Haroldy Arturo</bold>, friends find <harold>Harold</harold>, the free and approachable spirit. Yet before professional challenges, <arturo>Arturo</arturo> takes control, the serious and structured mind.

About.title: Professional Summary
About.p1: Senior Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience designing and developing scalable, high-performance web applications. Specialized in modern architectures using cutting-edge technologies.
About.p2: Expert in AI Prompting Engineering and integrating AI tools into development. I have led technical teams in building complex enterprise solutions, implementing development best practices and scalable architectures that have served thousands of users.
About.p3: I’m known for strong problem-solving skills, a high sense of responsibility and collaborative technical leadership—bringing clear communication, proactivity, and a commitment to quality.
About.quote: My extensive career has endowed me with technical solidity that transcends specific tools. In today's dynamic environment, adapting to new languages and technologies is not a barrier, but a natural competence in my profile that allows me to contribute immediate value in any technological ecosystem.

adsdigital.desc1: Designed and developed a reusable frontend framework with Next.js and a scalable backend with NestJS, Prisma and PostgreSQL, accelerating the launch of multiple SaaS products.
adsdigital.desc2: Led the evolution of legacy products (such as the old CVCreator) towards modern architectures, relaunching it as Editor-CV under the new Next.js/NestJS stack, migrating from monoliths to scalable services.
adsdigital.desc3: Developed <link>Find-Persons</link>, integrating external APIs for real-time search and structuring of public people data.
adsdigital.desc4: Implemented AI-based services like <link>AllRemoveBG</link> (AI background removal) and <link2>IQ-TestOnline</link2> (interactive intelligence tests), optimizing user experience and performance via microservices.

nwc10.desc1: Collaborated on the comprehensive ticketing system for theaters in Madrid, covering everything from QR and barcode generation logic to integrating thermal printer drivers at points of sale.
nwc10.desc2: Implemented web experiences for high-end hospitality, highlighting the creation of dynamic interactive menus for their commercial portal.
nwc10.desc3: Collaborated on the Mucha Comida project, integrating interactive maps with Leaflet for geolocation and advanced restaurant search, improving service usability.

onepingpong.desc1: Assumed technical leadership at a critical stage, restructuring the development department to sustain campaign infrastructure for clients like Goya, Maizena and America.
onepingpong.desc2: Created interactive web apps for digital advertising campaigns, optimizing engagement in the target audience for Latino food and textile products.
onepingpong.desc3: Contributed to key projects that led the company to be awarded by the Latin Community Consortium as a leading digital advertising company (2015-2016).

Education.title: Education & Certifications
Education.languages_note: English proficiency acquired during my residency in the United States, focusing on practical and conversational skills.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Interested? Get in touch with me, I'm available from 8:00 to 20:00, Spain time.
Contact.email_alternative: If you prefer, you can send me an email at haroldyarturo@gmail.com, I will answer as soon as possible.

Metadata.title: Haroldy Arturo - Senior Full Stack Developer | Next.js, React, NestJS
Metadata.description: Senior Full Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience in Next.js, React, TypeScript and NestJS. Specialized in scalable architectures and modern web development.
Metadata.keywords: Full Stack Developer, Senior Developer, Next.js, React, NestJS, TypeScript, Node.js

editor_cv.title: Editor-CV
editor_cv.description: Originally a legacy product (CVCreator), I led the complete modernization and re-launch as Editor-CV. We migrated from a monolithic architecture to a scalable microservices ecosystem using Next.js and NestJS. This transformation enhanced performance, user experience, and allowed for rapid deployment of new features in a SaaS environment.

find_persons.title: Find-Persons
find_persons.description: Developed a real-time people search platform integrating public data APIs. Focused on high-performance data structuring and user-friendly interface for public record accessibility.

all_remove_bg.title: AllRemoveBG
all_remove_bg.description: AI-powered application for automatic image background removal. Implements advanced computer vision algorithms to process images in real-time with high precision.

iq_test_online.title: IQ-TestOnline
iq_test_online.description: Platform for interactive intelligence tests. Built with a scalable microservices architecture to handle high traffic and provide real-time results and analytics.
